main_definition: The capital city of California, known as Sacramento or alternatively used in the context of an idiom to mean something absurdly unexpected or ridiculous.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express disbelief or surprise at a situation that seems illogical or unrealistic
meanings_and_examples.example: I can't believe you moved to Sacramento in the middle of winter without proper clothes!

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used informally, sometimes humorously, to refer to California, especially its capital city
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to take a road trip and explore all the sights across Sacramento.
